info.name: OzBargain Dark Theme
info.description:
OzBargain but for eye users. 
Turn on Dark Theme on ozbargain to help theme some smaller images and text I didn't bother to fix, it's in the "My Account" dropdown menu.

If you want to maintain the default font, or choose one of your own. Remove/edit 
"
body {
 font-family: Raleway !important
}"
info.additionalInfo:
Update v1.3 Have Your Say box wasn't themed
Update v1.2 I changed something but then I ate pretzels and forgot what it was.
Update v1.1 Darker than ever before
Update v1 Certified "Works on my Machine"
Release v0.1 Beta

This is an update of Ozbargain Darker by Alec Pirillo which was itself an update of "Dark Clean Ozbargain"
